records.location_details: Incident occurred north of Lesvos, between the Greek and Turkish maritime border. Initial coordinates: 39° 26' 45''N - 026° 26' 21''E. Later, a rubber boat was adrift at 39°16′N 026°35′E.
records.where_clear: North of Lesvos, Eastern Aegean Sea, near Greek-Turkish maritime border
records.location_text_raw: between the Greek and Turkish maritime border near the island of Lesvos; north of Lesvos (39° 26' 45''N - 026° 26' 21''E)
records.context_note: A Frontex Surveillance Aircraft (FSA) observed a rubber boat with approx. 20-30 POB near Lesvos. A Greek patrol boat was involved in towing an empty rubber boat, transferring migrants, and later leaving the rubber boat adrift. Greek authorities rejected an offer for a second SAR flight, stating the Turkish Coast Guard had assumed coordination. The rubber boat reportedly landed safely on Turkish shores.
records.evidence_quote: Frontex Surveillance Aircraft (FSA) spots a rubber boat with approx. 20-30 POB, stopped, and one Greek Patrol vessel is very close.
